title: Dual functionality of charge extraction and interface passivation by self-assembled monolayers in perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02661F, Review Article
Muhammad Azam, Tian Du, Zhongquan Wan, Heng Zhao, Huaibiao Zeng, Runmin Wei, Christoph J. Brabec, Junsheng Luo, Chunyang Jia
This review overviews the challenges at the buried interface of PSCs, defect passivation capabilities of SAMs, and its effectiveness compared to other passivating agents.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
